headline.main: German Economy Benefits When Banks Strengthen Capital: FinMin
headline.print_headline: German Economy Benefits When Banks Strengthen Capital: FinMin

lead_paragraph: Germany welcomes efforts by banks to increase capital, the finance ministry said on Monday, declining to comment specifically on plans by Deutsche Bank to raise 8 billion euros ($8.47 billion) by issuing new shares.
snippet: Germany welcomes efforts by banks to increase capital, the finance ministry said on Monday, declining to comment specifically on plans by Deutsche Bank to raise 8 billion euros ($8.47 billion) by issuing new shares....
